item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Academic makes it easy to create a beautiful website for free using Markdown. Customize anything on your site with widgets, themes, and language packs. Follow our easy step by step guide to learn how to build your own free website with Academic. Check out the personal demo or the business demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes. View the documentation Ask a question Request a feature or report a bug Updating?

item.title: My Git Archive
item.description: This is a repository of the Git commands I use to connect my RStudio with GitHub. Git Commands Archive git add --all git commit -m "comment" git push testing R in markdown str(iris) plot(iris)
